svm module¶

svm.diagnosis(filename)¶

given the testing filename in example folder, diagnose image

Parameters:filename (String) – name of the test file
Returns:diagnosis(String)
svm.formXYTraining(trainingD, trainingH)¶

given the total number of training data files, generate training matrix for svm

Parameters:
  • trainingD (String) – the number of diseased training file used
  • trainingH (String) – the number of healthy training file used
Returns:

X, Y (np.arrays)
svm.support_vm(X, Y, params)¶

given training X, Y matrices and and params of the test file, return predicted value

Parameters:
  • X (numpy array) – training modes and threshold values
  • Y (numpy array) – training results (0 represents healthy, 1 represents diseased)
  • params – a matrix of testing values (threshold and mode)
Returns:

clf.predict(params): result of prediction, 1 diseased, 0 healthy
